_header: As I stood in studying alone

Bod638.First Lines:
As I stode in studyenge alloneAstonyed in studye well
                    colde…
Bod638.Last Lines:
…Than I do that I with yen sehope yn hope out thus kan ye
                    folys fede
Bod638.Attributed Title: The complaynte A geyne Hope (209v and RT)

BLHar7333.First Lines:
As that I me stoode in studeying loo A looneA stonyed Rght soore in
                    studyes ful colde…
BLHar7333.Last Lines:
Bette þan þat I with eyen seeHope in hope owte þus
                    cane offt fooles feede
BLHar7333.Attributed Title:
Loo nowe here folowethe A Compleynte Ageynst hope & cetera (f.
                        135rb, rubric)
